title: Circuit-board type?
content:
Does anyone know of a face that has the character of circuit board wiring?  
I'm looking particularly for a font that has the round circles at the terminals...

Thanks!
author: ChuckGroth

comments.content: Another one: [FF Atomium](http://web.archive.org/web/20120515174419/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=atomium&x=0&y=0). The "Outline" version can be layered with the other weights to achieve a multi-colour effect. And there are nice dingbats :)
